test-step.description: And I open submenu Register of menu Daily Report
And I add new Daily report with data below | companyName | content | | CIJ | First daily report |
Then The system should show message save daily report successfully
When I add new Daily report with data below | companyName | content | | CIJ | Second daily report |
Then The system should show message save daily report successfully
